snippet: "Beasts of the Southern Wild" is considered a powerful magnet for acting trophies that would probably reward the spunky lead performance of its now 9-year-old star, Quvenzhané Wallis.
abstract: "Beasts of the Southern Wild" is considered a powerful magnet for acting trophies that would probably reward the spunky lead performance of its now 9-year-old star, Quvenzhané Wallis.

headline.main: 'Beasts of the Southern Wild' Ineligible for SAG Awards
headline.print_headline: Screen Actors Guild Declares Film Ineligible
